quote-text: Because many art and design students are particularly hard on themselves and tend to be perfectionists, [Anne] Beffel stresses the nonjudging that is cultivated through mindfulness, using Pema Chodron’s phrase, being “unconditionally friendly to oneself.”
quote-source: Daniel P. Barbezat and Mirabai Bush, from Chapter 5, Mindfulness, in the book, Contemplative Practices in Higher Education: Powerful Methods to Transform Teaching and Learning, published by Jossey-Bass, 2014. As quoted in 1335. Classroom Implications of Mindfulness, Tomorrow’s Professor eNewsletter, May 26, 2014
